city.name: Johannesburg
city.description: Johannesburg is the largest city in South Africa and is known as the economic powerhouse of the country. Located in the northeastern part of the country, it serves as the capital of the Gauteng province. Johannesburg, often referred to as Jo'burg or Jozi, has a rich history and cultural diversity.
